top_comments.comment: Are you up for the challenge? I am demonstrating the stretches at a beginner level in this video but if it’s too easy you can go deeper into them 💙

please make a Kpop music Workout, pleaseeeee 
lov u :)

comments_since_last_sample.body: Hi Anna, i just made it to do the splits! But my back knee always slides to the side and i don't know how i can remove this. If you know what i could do please tell me. But i'm so happy that i made it! I love all your Videos, and you're my Idol about flexibility. Thank you so much
Thanks Anna for stretch plans because i got my needle and front and middle splits

please make a Kpop music Workout, pleaseeeee 
lov u :)
